object.label:
System: Fashion Attire Classifier

The AI system in this example model takes images as an input and
performs classification into fashion attire categories (e.g. T-shirt,
pullover, dress, ...). It is trained on a dataset of labelled fashion
attire images.

Context: Faceted Search in Fashion Recommendation

The system aids the recommender system for a fashion online shop. Users
can upload images of fashion they like to find similar items available
for purchase, alongside text search and other filters. The uploaded
image is classified as a type of fashion attire, which the search
results are then restricted to (e.g. user uploads photo of a T-shirt, shop
recommends only T-shirts). Future development shall focus also on
recommending fashion attire similar in style to the uploaded image (e.g.
color, patterns, ...).
Description: The classification is not accurate.
Root Source Lifecycle Phase(s): Operate & Monitor
Description: Users are unsatisfied with the recommendations and leave the webshop, resulting in lost revenue.
Risk Mitigation: Testing with Focus Group
Description: The classification is tested with a focus group of typical users.
Description: The training data might include bias which is then learnt by the model, leading to biased classification.
Root Source Lifecycle Phase(s): Collect & Process Data
Risk Mitigation: Careful Dataset Selection and Preparation
Description: Carefully select proper dataset, explore data
Targeted Lifecycle Phase(s): Collect & Process Data
Description: Due to misclassification, the user is not shown recommendations for the correct type of fashion.

  • Preventive
  • Corrective
  • Detective
